biography: Matthew Quinn is a screenwriter and film studio story analyst. He received a B.A. in Film and Video from Columbia College and an M.F.A. in Screenwriting from Loyola Marymount University in Los Angeles.  Matt worked in feature development at DreamWorks Studios, DreamWorks Animation and as a reader for Ben Stiller's Red Hour Films.  His feature length script 'Cell-Out' was optioned by Flipzide Studios ('American Pie', 'Final Destination').  Matt has taught courses that cover the industry, aesthetics, and history of cinema at Loyola Marymount University and has been a guest speaker at Tribeca Flashpoint Media Arts Academy in Chicago.
